hero.title: Monad-lab Works: Encapsulating Complexity.
hero.description: A multi-disciplinary technology studio specializing in AI-driven content generation and advanced human-computer interaction software.

items.label: Unit 01:
items.title: Introspective Intelligence
items.description: Leveraging AI and algorithmic models to explore the boundaries of the human psyche.

items.label: Unit 03:
items.title: Precision Vision

about.title: One Person, One Universe.
paragraphs: Monad-lab Works began as a single operator building complete systems from first principles. Each engagement is treated as its own universe: bounded, coherent, and internally consistent.
The Monad is a self-contained unit of logic. We design our software the same way, with precise interfaces and composable modules that preserve clarity while scaling complexity.
about.founderNote: A single identity guiding a multi-disciplinary studio, unifying research, design, and engineering under one logic.

contact.title: Open a Channel.
contact.description: Open a channel to the lab for partnerships, research, or bespoke systems.

privacy.eyebrow: Privacy Policy for Monad-lab Works LLC
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Welcome to Monad-lab Works LLC ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our software applications, including our introspective AI tools and creative platforms.

sections.title: 1. Information We Collect
body: To provide our "Unit 01: Introspective Intelligence" services (such as metaphysical analysis and CCBT tools), we may collect:

items.label: Personal Data
items.text: Name, email address, and birth details (date, time, and location) specifically for algorithmic calculations.

items.label: Usage Data
items.text: Information on how you interact with our apps to improve user experience.

items.label: Payment Data
items.text: All payments are processed through Stripe. We do not store your credit card information on our servers.

sections.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
body: We use your data solely to:

items.text: Generate personalized insights and AI-driven content.
Process transactions via Stripe Atlas-supported systems.
Maintain and improve our technology studio's products.

sections.title: 3. Data Protection & Storage
body: As a "One-Person Business" driven by the philosophy of the Monad, we prioritize data integrity:

items.text: We do not sell or trade your personal or introspective data to third parties.
We use industry-standard encryption to protect your information.

sections.title: 4. International Transfers
body: Monad-lab Works LLC is incorporated in Delaware, USA. By using our services, you consent to the transfer of information to the US, where data protection laws may differ from those in your jurisdiction.

sections.title: 5. Contact Us
body: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

terms.eyebrow: Terms of Service for Monad-lab Works LLC
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to Monad-lab Works. By accessing our website (https://www.google.com/search?q=monad-lab.com) or using our applications (the "Services"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

sections.title: 1. Services Provided
body: Monad-lab Works LLC provides AI-driven software for introspective analysis, content generation, and technical tools. All tools provided are for entertainment, educational, or creative purposes only.

items.label: No Professional Advice
items.text: Insights provided by our "Introspective Intelligence" tools (including metaphysical or CCBT-based analysis) are generated by AI and do not constitute medical, psychological, financial, or legal advice.

items.label: "As Is" Basis
items.text: Our services are provided "as is" without any warranties, express or implied. Monad-lab Works LLC does not guarantee the accuracy or reliability of any AI-generated results.

items.label: Processing
items.text: All transactions are processed securely via Stripe.

items.label: No Refunds
items.text: Due to the digital nature of our services, all sales are final. We do not offer refunds once a digital report is generated or a subscription period has commenced, except as required by law.

items.label: Cancellations
items.text: You may cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings or by contacting founder@monad-lab.com.

items.label: Our Content
items.text: The software, branding (Monad-lab), and original algorithms are the property of Monad-lab Works LLC.

items.label: User Content
items.text: You retain ownership of any input data, but grant us a license to process it as necessary to provide the requested services.

sections.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
body: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Monad-lab Works LLC and its sole operator Xiangyu shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the services.

sections.title: 6. Governing Law
body: These terms are governed by the laws of the State of Delaware, USA, without regard to its conflict of law principles.

sections.title: 7. Contact
body: For any legal or billing inquiries, please contact: Monad-lab Works LLC
